Author: emaaha50
Text: I’m the same way!!! I have the hardest time saying no to people it’s one of my biggest weaknesses.

Author: mandyjulieannne
Text: I do these things too. I think it has a lot to do, for me, with how I was raised. It was expected that when someone offered something to me, I was gracious and accepting of that. In my adult life, this translated to me never being able to say no to people. It's quite a frustration and something that a lot of therapy is only slightly helping with.
